Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Salary $40 - $55 an hour Job Type Full-time Part-time Contract Internship Full stack, back end and front end developer Medical Database, Inc. Medical Database provides reliable and updated medical information to healthcare providers, insurance companies, and educational institutions. Our proprietary Laboratory Decision System (LDS) includes expert clinical ‘appropriateness’ criteria and integrated software applications for optimized test ordering and utilization management. The LDS system is designed to help physicians better understand, select, order, utilize and interpret the most relevant lab tests for their patient’s condition. LDS utilizes our proprietary ranking system and enables healthcare providers and care managers to correctly select tests based on diseases, symptoms, ICD10 codes, and other available data and industry best practices. Job Description Full stack, back end and front end developer Architect, design, and code new features and enhancements of a complex medical database algorithm-based software as needed Work with the team in Application programming interface (API) development and maintenance Work with vendors on integration of our database to Clinical Decision Support (CDS), EMR, EHR and Laboratory Information Management systems Provide technical support to vendors and clients as needed Learn new languages, technology needed to improve and support our technology Cultivate and promote Medical Database Corporation values and culture Job Requirements: BS or MS in Computer Science Full stack, back end and front end developer 3+ year experience in Software Engineering 3+ Experience in Clojure and React 3+ Experience in ClojureScript, CircleCI and Datomic datatabase 3+ Experience in Amazon Web Services; EC2, S3, IAM, CodeDeploy, Elastic Beanstalk, RDS and DynamoDB Understanding basic algorithms and data structures Bonus: Experience in medical databases; ICD10, CPT codes, diseases and laboratory databases Good communication and management skills What we offer: Competitive salary and stock options A comprehensive employment benefit package Flexible working hours Good teamwork and environment Contract Length: More than 1 year Hours per week: 20-29 Work Remotely Yes Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Contract, Internship Pay: $40.00 - $55.00 per hour Benefits: 401(k) Dental insurance Flexible schedule Health insurance Paid time off Vision insurance Schedule: 4 hour shift 8 hour shift Experience: Clojure and Clojure Script: 3 years (Required) React: 3 years (Required) Work Location: In person Health insurance If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.
